titleStmt.title: The supplicacion: that the nobles and comons of Osteryke made lately by their messaungers, vnto kyng Ferdinandus, in the cause of the Christen religion Item. The kynges answere to the same. Vvherpon foloweth the wordes that the messaungers spake vnto the kyng agayne at their departing.
titleStmt.author: Coverdale, Miles, 1488-1568.
Ferdinand I, Holy Roman Emperor, 1503-1564.

notesStmt.note: Translator's preface headed: Myles C. [i.e. Miles Coverdale] to the reader.
Place of publication and printer's name supplied and publication date conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
